Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Lamia4909
Reviews.Content: I love my phone!  This is my second smart phone.  I LOVE having the QWERTY keyboard still and the two touch screens!  I loved it so much I bought one for my mom and she loves it too!

ProductInfo.Features:
2G Network GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 & 3G Network HSDPA 850 / 1900 / 2100
3.2-MP camera/camcorder microSD expansion; Bluetooth stereo music; Android 2.2 (Froyo)
Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 240 hours (10 days) of standby time
800 MHz processor; Wireless-N Wi-Fi networking (with optional Wi-Fi Mobile Hotspot and tethering capabilities); GPS navigation
Internal 260 MB, 256 MB RAM
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Doubletime I857 Unlocked Android Dual Screen QWERTY Smartphone - White
